scene1.title: Be able to make web pages
scene1.description:
Have you ever thought "I want to create my own Web page?" This scene describes the skills needed to make a web page.

When you are just starting to learn, you may find it difficult because there are many unfamiliar grammars and unknown words. However, if you steadily learn from basic skills, you will surely be able to make it. First, let's become able to create a web page with a simple layout.

When you have learned the skills of this scene, you are ready to create and publish a web page. We look forward to the day the web page is published.
